alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Brantley; Clinch; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pierce, southeastern Atkinson, west central Brantley, northern Ware and northeastern Clinch Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 156 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Cogdell, or 11 miles north of Argyle, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Argyle, Boggy Bay, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Manor, Cogdell, Dixie Union and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Atkinson; Brantley; Clinch; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware
